transliteration_en: Wa laa tutee'ooo amral musrifeen
translation_en: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,
translation_id: Janganlah mengikuti perintah orang-orang yang melampaui batas.

arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يُفْسِدُوْنَ فِى الْاَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa yuslihoon
transliteration_id: Allażīna yufsidūna fil-arḍi wa lā yaṣliḥūn(a).
translation_en: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."
translation_id: (Mereka) yang berbuat kerusakan di bumi dan tidak melakukan perbaikan.”

transliteration_en: Qaalooo innamaa anta minal musahhareen
translation_en: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Sesungguhnya engkau hanyalah termasuk orang-orang yang terkena sihir.

arabic: مَآ اَنْتَ اِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَاۙ فَأْتِ بِاٰيَةٍ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi Aayatin in kunta minas saadiqeen
transliteration_id: Mā anta illā basyarum miṡlunā, fa'ti bi'āyatin in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
translation_en: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
translation_id: Engkau tidak lain hanyalah manusia seperti kami. Maka, datangkanlah tanda (mukjizat) jika engkau termasuk orang-orang yang benar.”

arabic: قَالَ هٰذِهٖ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَّلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُوْمٍ ۚ
transliteration_en: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw w alakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom
transliteration_id: Qāla hāżihī nāqatul lahā syirbuw wa lakum syirbu yaumim ma‘lūm(in).
translation_en: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.
translation_id: Dia (Saleh) menjawab, “Ini seekor unta betina. Dia punya (giliran) minum dan kamu punya (giliran) minum (pula) pada hari yang ditentukan.

arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوْهَا بِسُوْۤءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem
transliteration_id: Wa lā tamassūhā bisū'in fa ya'khużakum ‘ażābu yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
translation_en: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."
translation_id: Janganlah menyentuhnya dengan suatu kejahatan. Nanti kamu akan ditimpa azab pada hari yang dahsyat.”

transliteration_en: Fa'aqaroohaa fa asbahoo naadimeen
translation_en: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.
translation_id: Mereka membunuhnya, lalu mereka menjadi orang-orang yang menyesal.

arabic: فَاَخَذَهُمُ الْعَذَابُۗ اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً ۗوَمَا كَانَ اَكْثَرُهُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum m'mineen
transliteration_id: Fa akhażahumul-‘ażāb(u), inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan), wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
translation_id: Mereka ditimpa azab. Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah), tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak beriman.

transliteration_en: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
translation_en: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu, Dialah yang benar-benar Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Penyayang.

transliteration_en: kazzabat qawmu Lootinil mursaleen
translation_en: The people of Lot denied the messengers
translation_id: Kaum Lut telah mendustakan para rasul.

arabic: اِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ اَخُوْهُمْ لُوْطٌ اَلَا تَتَّقُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon
transliteration_id: Iż qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūn(a).
translation_en: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
translation_id: Ketika saudara mereka, Lut, berkata kepada mereka, “Mengapa kamu tidak bertakwa?”

transliteration_en: Innee lakum rasoolun ameen
translation_en: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya aku adalah seorang rasul tepercaya (yang diutus) kepadamu.

transliteration_en: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon
translation_en: So fear Allah and obey me.
translation_id: Maka, bertakwalah kepada Allah dan taatlah kepadaku.

arabic: وَمَآ اَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ اَجْرٍ اِنْ اَجْرِيَ اِلَّا عَلٰى رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
translation_id: Aku tidak meminta imbalan kepadamu atas (ajakan) itu. Imbalanku tidak lain hanyalah dari Tuhan semesta alam.

transliteration_en: Ataatoonaz zukraana minal 'aalameen
translation_en: Do you approach males among the worlds
translation_id: Mengapa kamu mendatangi jenis laki-laki di antara manusia (berbuat homoseks)?

arabic: وَتَذَرُوْنَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُمْ مِّنْ اَزْوَاجِكُمْۗ بَلْ اَنْتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon
transliteration_id: Wa tażarūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum, bal antum qamun ‘ādūn(a).
translation_en: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."
translation_id: Sementara itu, kamu tinggalkan (perempuan) yang diciptakan Tuhan untuk menjadi istri-istrimu? Kamu (memang) kaum yang melampaui batas.”

arabic: قَالُوْا لَىِٕنْ لَّمْ تَنْتَهِ يٰلُوْطُ لَتَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُخْرَجِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen
transliteration_id: Qālū la'illam tantahi yā lūṭu latakūnanna minal-mukhrajīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Wahai Lut, jika tidak berhenti (melarang kami), niscaya engkau benar-benar akan termasuk orang-orang yang diusir.”

transliteration_en: Qaala innee li'amalikum minal qaaleen
translation_en: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
translation_id: Dia (Lut) berkata, “Sesungguhnya aku termasuk orang-orang yang sangat benci terhadap perbuatanmu.”

transliteration_en: Rabbi najjjinee wa ahlee mimmmaa ya'maloon
transliteration_id: Rabbi najjinī wa ahlī mimmā ya‘malūn(a).
translation_en: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
translation_id: (Lut berdoa,) “Wahai Tuhanku, selamatkanlah aku dan keluargaku dari apa yang mereka perbuat.”

transliteration_en: Fanajjainaahu wa ahlahooo ajma'een
translation_en: So We saved him and his family, all,
translation_id: Maka, Kami selamatkan dia bersama semua keluarganya,

transliteration_en: Illaa 'ajoozan filghaabireen
translation_en: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.
translation_id: kecuali seorang perempuan tua (istrinya) yang termasuk golongan (orang-orang kafir) yang tertinggal.

transliteration_en: Summa dammarnal aa khareen
translation_en: Then We destroyed the others.
translation_id: Kemudian, Kami binasakan yang lain.

arabic: وَاَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ مَّطَرًاۚ فَسَاۤءَ مَطَرُ الْمُنْذَرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen
transliteration_id: Wa amṭarnā ‘alaihim maṭarā(n), fa sā'a maṭarul-munżarīn(a).
translation_en: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
translation_id: Kami hujani mereka (dengan batu). Betapa buruk hujan yang menimpa orang-orang yang telah diberi peringatan itu.

arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً ۗوَمَا كَانَ اَكْثَرُهُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan),  wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah), tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak beriman.

transliteration_en: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
translation_en: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu, Dialah yang benar-benar Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Penyayang.

transliteration_en: Kazzaba As haabul Aykatil mursaleen
translation_en: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
translation_id: Penduduk Aikah (Madyan) telah mendustakan para rasul.

arabic: اِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ اَلَا تَتَّقُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
transliteration_id: Iż qāla lahum syu‘aibun alā tattaqūn(a).
translation_en: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
translation_id: Ketika Syu‘aib berkata kepada mereka, “Mengapa kamu tidak bertakwa?

transliteration_en: Innee lakum Rasoolun ameen
translation_en: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya aku adalah seorang rasul tepercaya (yang diutus) kepadamu.

transliteration_en: Fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon
translation_en: So fear Allah and obey me.
translation_id: Maka, bertakwalah kepada Allah dan taatlah kepadaku.

arabic: وَمَآ اَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ اَجْرٍ اِنْ اَجْرِيَ اِلَّا عَلٰى رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Wa mā as'alukum ‘alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illā ‘alā rabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.
translation_id: Aku tidak meminta imbalan kepadamu atas (ajakan) itu. Imbalanku tidak lain, kecuali dari Tuhan semesta alam.

arabic: ۞ اَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُوْنُوْا مِنَ الْمُخْسِرِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Awful kaila wa laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen
translation_en: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
translation_id: Sempurnakanlah takaran dan janganlah kamu termasuk orang-orang yang merugikan orang lain.

transliteration_en: Wa zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem
translation_en: And weigh with an even balance.
translation_id: Timbanglah dengan timbangan yang benar.

arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا النَّاسَ اَشْيَاۤءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِى الْاَرْضِ مُفْسِدِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa 'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
transliteration_id: Wa lā tabkhasun-nāsa asy-yā'ahum wa lā ta‘ṡau fil-arḍi mufsidīn(a).
translation_en: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.
translation_id: Janganlah kamu merugikan manusia dengan mengurangi hak-haknya dan janganlah membuat kerusakan di bumi.

transliteration_en: Wattaqul lazee khalaqakum waljibillatal awwaleen
translation_en: And fear He who created you and the former creation."
translation_id: Bertakwalah kepada Allah yang telah menciptakanmu dan umat-umat yang terdahulu.”

transliteration_en: Qaalooo innamaa anta minal musahhareen
translation_en: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Sesungguhnya engkau hanyalah termasuk orang-orang yang terkena sihir.

arabic: وَمَآ اَنْتَ اِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَاِنْ نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ الْكٰذِبِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa wa innazunnuka laminal kaazibeen
transliteration_id: Wa mā anta illā basyarum miṡlunā wa in naẓunnuka laminal-kāżibīn(a).
translation_en: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.
translation_id: Engkau tidak lain hanyalah seorang manusia seperti kami dan sesungguhnya kami yakin bahwa engkau benar-benar termasuk para pembohong.

arabic: فَاَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاۤءِ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Fa asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen
transliteration_id: Fa asqiṭ ‘alainā kisafam minas-samā'i in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
translation_en: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
translation_id: Maka, jatuhkanlah kepada kami kepingan-kepingan dari langit (agar kami binasa) jika engkau termasuk orang-orang yang benar.”

transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbeee a'lamu bimaa ta'maloon
translation_en: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."
translation_id: Dia (Syu‘aib) berkata, “Tuhanku paling mengetahui apa yang kamu kerjakan.”

arabic: فَكَذَّبُوْهُ فَاَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ الظُّلَّةِ ۗاِنَّهٗ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem
transliteration_id: Fa każżabūhu fa akhażahum ‘ażābu yaumiẓ-ẓullah(ti), innahū kāna ‘ażāba yaumin ‘aẓīm(in).
translation_en: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
translation_id: Lalu, mereka mendustakannya (Syu‘aib). Maka, mereka ditimpa azab pada hari yang berawan gelap. Sesungguhnya itu adalah azab hari yang dahsyat.

arabic: اِنَّ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ لَاٰيَةً ۗوَمَا كَانَ اَكْثَرُهُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Inna fī żālika la'āyah(tan),  wa mā kāna akṡaruhum mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu benar-benar terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah), tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak beriman.

transliteration_en: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
translation_en: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu, Dialah yang benar-benar Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Penyayang.

transliteration_en: Wa innahoo latanzeelu Rabbil 'aalameen
translation_en: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya ia (Al-Qur’an) benar-benar diturunkan Tuhan semesta alam.

transliteration_en: Nazala bihir Roohul Ameen
translation_en: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
translation_id: Ia (Al-Qur’an) dibawa turun oleh Ruhulamin (Jibril).

transliteration_en: 'Alaa qalbika litakoona minal munzireen
translation_en: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -
translation_id: (Diturunkan) ke dalam hatimu (Nabi Muhammad) agar engkau menjadi salah seorang pemberi peringatan.

transliteration_en: Bilisaanin 'Arabiyyim mubeen
translation_en: In a clear Arabic language.
translation_id: (Diturunkan) dengan bahasa Arab yang jelas.

transliteration_en: Wa innahoo lafee Zuburil awwaleen
translation_en: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya ia (Al-Qur’an) benar-benar (disebut) dalam kitab-kitab orang terdahulu.

arabic: اَوَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهُمْ اٰيَةً اَنْ يَّعْلَمَهٗ عُلَمٰۤؤُا بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ
transliteration_en: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel
transliteration_id: Awalam yakul lahum āyatan ay ya‘lamahū ‘ulamā'u banī isrā'īl(a).
translation_en: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?
translation_id: Apakah tidak (cukup) menjadi bukti bagi mereka bahwa ia (Al-Qur’an) diketahui oleh para ulama Bani Israil?

transliteration_en: Wa law nazzalnaahu 'alaa ba'dil a'jameen
translation_en: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners
translation_id: Seandainya Kami menurunkannya kepada sebagian dari golongan non-Arab.

arabic: فَقَرَاَهٗ عَلَيْهِمْ مَّا كَانُوْا بِهٖ مُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۗ
transliteration_en: Faqara ahoo 'alaihim maa kaanoo bihee mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Fa qara'ahū ‘alaihim mā kānū bihī mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
translation_id: Lalu, dia membacakannya kepada mereka (orang-orang kafir), niscaya mereka tidak juga akan beriman kepadanya.

transliteration_en: Kazaalika salaknaahu fee quloobil mujrimeen
translation_en: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
translation_id: Demikianlah, Kami masukkan (sifat dusta dan ingkar) ke dalam hati para pendurhaka.
